    /*
    |--------------------------------------------------------------------------
    | OAT Guard
    |--------------------------------------------------------------------------
    |
    | OAT, stands for (Opaque access tokens) guard uses database backed tokens
    | to authenticate requests.
    |
    */
    api: {
      implementation: OATGuardContract<'user', 'api'>
      config: OATGuardConfig<'user'>
      client: OATClientContract<'user'>
    }
